remarks: If an element divides another in a subring, then it also divides the other in the parent ring.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:

subrgdvds.2 $e |- .|| = ( ||r ` R ) $.
subrgdvds.3 $e |- E = ( ||r ` S ) $.
